visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts column chart with drilldown functionality. The chart should have a title 'Breadcrumbs, single button style'. The x-axis should be of type 'category'. The chart should include a series named 'Supply' with data points for 'Fruits', 'Vegetables', and 'Meat'. Each data point should have drilldown capabilities. The drilldown should include additional series for 'Fruits' (with subcategories 'Citrus' and 'Tropical'), 'Vegetables' (with subcategories 'Potatoes' and 'Cucumber'), 'Citrus' (with subcategories 'Lemon' and 'Orange'), 'Tropical' (with subcategories 'Banana' and 'Mango'), and 'Lemon' (with subcategories 'Typ A' and 'Typ B'). The breadcrumbs should be styled with a specific button theme, floating to the right, and not showing the full path.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts configuration sets up a column chart with drilldown functionality. The chart is titled 'Breadcrumbs, single button style' and uses a category-type x-axis. The main series, named 'Supply', includes data points for 'Fruits', 'Vegetables', and 'Meat', each with drilldown capabilities. The drilldown feature is configured to include additional series for 'Fruits' (with subcategories 'Citrus' and 'Tropical'), 'Vegetables' (with subcategories 'Potatoes' and 'Cucumber'), 'Citrus' (with subcategories 'Lemon' and 'Orange'), 'Tropical' (with subcategories 'Banana' and 'Mango'), and 'Lemon' (with subcategories 'Typ A' and 'Typ B'). The breadcrumbs are styled with a specific button theme, floating to the right, and configured not to show the full path. This setup allows users to explore hierarchical data in a structured and visually appealing manner.
